communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

- Any records related to the 10/15/2021 shooting death of Keeva Scatter (AKA Battlerack Scatter) (age 34) in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.  
- Any records related to the perpetrators, or suspected perpetrators.
- The e-trace for the firearm used in the shooting, or any other information about the weapon.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Caroline Madigan

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Krys Brandon Ruiz
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Any records related to the 3/28/2021 shooting death of Krys Brandon Ruiz (age 26) in Lompoc, California, in an alley between the 100 blocks of North H and G streets.  
- Any records related to the perpetrators, Mauricio Calderon and Andrew White, or suspected perpetrators.
- The e-trace for the firearm used in the shooting, or any other information about the weapon.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Caroline Madigan

communications.subject: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Jeffrey Bright/Jasmine Cannady
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Any records related to the 02/22/2021 shooting death of Jeffery "JJ" Bright (16) (AKA Jeffery Bright) and Jasmine Cannady (22) in Ambridge, PA, in the 900 block of Maplewood Avenue.  
- Any records related to the perpetrator, Krisinda Ann Bright, or suspected perpetrator.
- The e-trace for the firearm used in the shooting, or any other information about the weapon.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Caroline Madigan
